A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie rocks on so many levels. It took me about 12 hours to process after viewing it the first time\, given how it blossoms and develops the story line into something I never imagined; but in general\, every moment of the movie is satisfying and entertaining.  I honestly can't wait to see it again. Have an open mind and understand that trolls will be trolls\, no matter what.
